attributes.action: Close schools and universities due to covid-19
attributes.additional_details: Schools don’t social distance and schools are not that clean schools are the main causes of germs spreading. We all know schools and universities is the hot spot for covid-19, there is no point in going into a second national lockdown if schools are open, the cases are going to rise children are going to get scared and bring it back to their families. Yes education is important but so is my children’s health! health before education and i’m sure any parent would agree!!
attributes.background: Schools and universities should shut due to the ongoing rise of covid-19.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Close all Schools and colleges and Universities during second lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557413

Close Schools and Colleges during a second nationwide lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557012

Force Universities to close commencing National Lockdown on November 5th 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558383

Reclose schools and colleges due to increase in COVID-19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

Require university campuses to close to stop the spread of COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552512
